comments:
build I20050222 + latest UI and tests from head

The IntroTest.testClose fails on:
  assertTrue(((WorkbenchWindow) window).getCoolBarVisible());

I consistently see this on Win2K, but it's not happening on other platforms or
in the releng tests.  When I trace through it, hideView gets called on the intro
adapter, but it's not actually disposed since its reference count in the
ViewFactory isn't going down to 0 (it's 1), as if the view was shared with
another perspective.  Restoring the coolbar is done in the dispose of the intro
adapter, so this doesn't get called.
